remarks: Cancellation-type law that "extracts" a vector ` A ` from its inner product with a proportional vector ` B ` .  (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: normcan $p |- ( ( B e. ~H /\ B =/= 0h /\ A e. ( span ` { B } ) ) -> ( ( ( A .ih B ) / ( ( normh ` B ) ^ 2 ) ) .h B ) = A ) $.
